infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Allow AgentTown to use the microphone for voice input.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Allow AgentTown to use speech recognition for voice input.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow AgentTown to access the camera for sharing photos.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow AgentTown to access your photo library to share images.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow AgentTown to save images to your photo library.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow AgentTown to use the microphone for voice input.
plugins.speechRecognitionPermission: Allow AgentTown to use speech recognition for voice input.
